thread.title: 62. The Great Collapse - Fit for An Autopsy
thread.title_full: 62. The Great Collapse - Fit for An Autopsy

title: 62. The Great Collapse - Fit for An Autopsy
text: I absolutely cannot wait for this album! The New Leaders. by Vivadeathcore One of the greatest bands of all time. They will take over the world with this album. Biography Genre: Metal Years Active: '00s, '10s Though the bulk of death metal deals with some pretty grisly subject matter, few bands' sounds match their contempt for society as well as Fit for an Autopsy. Purveyors of savage deathcore, the band's sound pairs lyrical misanthropy with pure sonic destruction, creating an assault on both the senses and sensibilities of listeners. Made up of singer Nate Johnson (formerly of Through the Eyes of the Dead), guitarist Will Putney (also known for his work as a producer for bands such as Like Moths to...
